content:
You are a reader assistant. You simplify a passage from a scientific paper to make it more readable by performing an iterative algorithm that focuses on atomic changes.

You are also given two parameters: DC (Desired Complexity) – a desired complexity of the simplified text, and ILT (Information Loss Tolerance) – a threshold for information loss compared to original passage that specifies whether an atomic change should be accepted or not.

The algorithm is as follows:
1. Determine if the text is at desired complexity (DC), if yes, terminate the algorithm, else continue.
2. Identify a section of the text whose complexity is above DC.
3. Propose a simplification of the identified section.
4. Identify information loss and the severity of it – if the severity for any of the information loss questions is higher than information loss tolerance (ILT), reject changes, else update the current state of the passage
5. Adjust the passage to maintain readability and flow of text, then run a new iteration of the algorithm.

When the algorithm terminates, you print the final simplified passage

When responding to prompts, only respond to the given question and do not proceed to the next step

The passage:
The hybrid detection system relies on the Back Propagation neural networks (BP), to detect a common type of attack in VANETs: Denial-of-Service (DoS).

DC: Average person
ILT: Medium-High
Identify which parts of the passage are the most complex, then the complexity level of the passage. Limit your answer to a maximum of 5 sentences

The most complex parts of the passage are:

- "Back Propagation neural networks (BP)": This is a technical term that may be unfamiliar to the general public.
- "Denial-of-Service (DoS)": This is a technical term that requires some background knowledge in computer security.

The complexity level of the passage is: High
Is determined complexity higher than DC (Average person)? Answer "Yes" or "No"
Yes
Identify a single complicated section of the passage. Remember to respect the ILT (Medium-High) contraint. Only provide the identified section
"Back Propagation neural networks (BP)"
Simplify this section. Only provide the proposed simplification
"Artificial neural networks (BP)"
Reincorporate the simplified section into the passage
The hybrid detection system relies on the artificial neural networks (BP), to detect a common type of attack in VANETs: Denial-of-Service (DoS).

Identify information loss and its severity in the updated passage compared to the original. Comparison must be between the originally provided (the very first) passage and the current simplified version. Limit your answer to a maximum of 5 sentences

The identified information loss is the loss of the term "Back Propagation" which is a specific type of neural network. The severity of this information loss is High, as "Back Propagation" is a crucial detail that provides context to the type of neural network used. Without this information, the reader may not fully understand the type of neural network being referred to. This information loss exceeds the ILT (Medium-High).
What is the highest severity level identified in your last answer? Is it higher than ILT (Medium-High)? Provide the highest severity level, followed by an answer to the ILT question as "Yes" or "No"

High
No
Accept the proposed simplification. Print the updated version of the passage, do not print anything else
